mapper.select: select a.*,b.name as subtype_name,c.name as prod_name,c.spec as prod_spec,c.unit as prod_unit,d.name as brand_name,e.name as supplier_name from ems_equipment a inner join ems_equipmentsubtype b on a.subtype_id=b.id inner join ems_equipmentprod c on a.prod_id=c.id inner join ems_brand d on a.brand_id=d.id inner join ems_supplier e on a.supplier_id=e.id inner join ems_equipment_store f on a.ecode=f.ecode where a.ecode=#{ecode} and f.store_id=#{store_id} and a.status='in_storage'

select a.*,b.name as store_name,c.name as workunit_name,d.name as project_name from ems_installout a inner join ems_store b on a.store_id=b.id inner join ems_workUnit c on a.workUnit_id=c.id inner join ems_project d on a.project_id=d.id where a.id=#{installOut_id}

select a.*,b.name as subtype_name,c.name as prod_name,c.spec as prod_spec,c.unit as prod_unit,d.name as brand_name,e.name as supplier_name,f.name as installOutType_name from (select f.*,a.subtype_id,a.prod_id,a.brand_id,a.supplier_id,a.style from ems_equipment a inner join ems_installoutlist f on a.ecode=f.ecode and f.installOut_id=#{installOut_id}) a inner join ems_equipmentsubtype b on a.subtype_id=b.id inner join ems_equipmentprod c on a.prod_id=c.id inner join ems_brand d on a.brand_id=d.id inner join ems_supplier e on a.supplier_id=e.id inner join ems_installouttype f on a.installOutType_id=f.id
mapper.update: update ems_installoutlist set installOutListType=#{installOutListType}, returnDate=sysdate,pole_id=#{pole_id} where installOut_id=#{installOut_id} and ecode=#{ecode}
mapper.select: select a.*,b.name as store_name,c.name as workUnit_name,d.name as project_name from ems_installout a,ems_store b,ems_workunit c,ems_project d where a.store_id=b.id and a.workunit_id=c.id and a.project_id=d.id and a.status='edit'
